articles.title: About this blog
articles.contents:
This personal blog is updated with the coursework of Visual Analytics and Applications, taught by Professor Kam Tin Seong at Singapore Management University. And in the future, it might also be updated with my other coursework and projects.
The blog was built using distill and rmarkdown, hosted on netify. A handy guide for creating a website can be found here.
The design of the blog was created with some graphics and CSS:
CSS Templates
Illustration by Freepik Storyset
Slidesgo.com

            BIO
            The fortune of data never stop increasing and I keep learning to go further in this data journey. Currently studying in SMU, I upgrade my skill sets and persuade career as a good data analyst.
            
            
            EDUCATION
            
            Singapore Management University | Singapore, SG
            Master of IT in Business | January 2021 - (Expected) April 2022
            
            
            University of Electronic and Science Technology of China | Chengdu, CHINA
            B.S. in Finance and Computer Science | September 2016 - June 2020
